name: Tiny Island (Bad_Hat)
description:
This is a small game I worked on during the summer.

Gather wood to create barricades and survive from zombies during the night.

Move with [WASD]

Open menu with [ESCAPE]

[1] You can select and axe to break walls and trees. Use the axe with mouse click near a tree or wall.

[2] You can select a gun to shoot at the zombies with, aim and shoot with the mouse.

[3] You can go in build mode if you have wood and build barricades with your mouse.

Swap faster using the scrollwheel.
